name: DungeonGame
description:
This is just small update of a game I created for my main programming assignment during my first year at University.

Aim of the game is to run around via WASD/Arrowkeys/Xbox360 controller and collect as many coins as you can. There are a few pickups that help gameplay; speedboost, torches and health.

Avoid ghosts at all costs! Grey (Ambushers) will damage you from a distance, Red (Chasers) will damage you on impact and actively seek you out, Purple (Lurkers) are invisible and will appear when you're near them, they are insta-death :(

.ZIp contains install instructions etc within the README.txt
